About Me

I'm Ankita Bele, Civil student currently pursuing my B.Tech at MIT Academy of Engineering. I aspire to make meaningful contributions in the realm. Passionate about exploring new technologies, I focus on solving real-life problems by learning new skills. My academic journey and practical experience have equipped me with a strong foundation in civil engineering, driving me to create innovative solutions

Experience

Arrcrane Design Group

Intern - January 2022 - Februaray 2022

Assisted in design & visualization of sustainable multi-family housing project, contributing to energy-efficient solutions & BIM modeling. Gained practical experience in architectural design process, from concept sketches to construction documents, within a collaborative studio environment.

Autodesk Autocad Revit Sketch up Design Soft skills

Gharkul Constructions PVT LTD

Intern - January 2023 - Februaray 2023

Managed subcontractors and coordinated construction activities . Implemented safety protocols and monitored progress to ensure project completion on time and within budget. Performed structural analysis of and designed reinforcement . Contributed to design development. Contributed to sustainable infrastructure development through project-specific initiatives.

Layout Autocad Task Management Project Planning Layout Design

Public Works Department

Intern - June 2023 - July 2023

Internship at the PWD provided me with invaluable hands-on experience in flood risk assessment and mitigation, allowing me to develop strong technical skills and contribute to a project with real-world impact on a vulnerable community. Assisted in infrastructure assessment and rehabilitation planning for urban roads and bridges. Gained exposure to construction site supervision and material quality control procedures.

GIS Data Analysis Mapping Surveying Site Management

Projects

Fragility Analysis oF RCC frames

Greywater treatment and recycling

Earthquake-Resistant Buildings
